name: Fairy Mahjong Christmas Puzzle
description:
Fairy Mahjong Christmas is a highly innovative and addictive 3D skill-based puzzle game. Combining outstanding levels, colorful Christmas themed graphics and great audio effects it is one of the most original and fun games in the App Store.
Fairy Mahjong Christmas combines match three game-plays with accurate touch controls in a 3D environment.

- 45 levels
- Beautiful Christmas themed 3D graphics
- Easy, normal and hard game modes
- Great soundtracks and audio effects
- Fun and addictive game-play elements
